mn81:6.16: ādāya → āhara (mr) | sottisināniṃ → sottiṃ sināniṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); sottisinānaṃ (sya-all, km, mr)
mn81:8.13: vinivaṭṭetvā → viniveṭhetvā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); vinivedhetvā (cck)
mn81:8.16: sīsaṃnhātaṃ → sasīsaṃ nahātaṃ (bj); sīsanhātaṃ (sya-all, km); sīsanahātaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn81:14.2: bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhadraṃ → bhadraṃ bhadraṃ (mr)
mn81:18.5: ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa → ghaṭikāre kumbhakāre (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, km); ghaṭīkāre kumbhakāre (cck, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn81:18.12: kumbhakāro pannamusalo na sahatthā pathaviṃ khaṇati → kumbhakāro na musalena na sahatthā paṭhaviñca khanati (sya-all, km); kumbhakāro na musalena na sahatthā paṭhaviṃ khaṇati (pts-vp-pli1ed); kumbhakāro na musalena sahatthā pathaviñca khaṇati (mr)
mn81:18.13: mūsikukkaro → mūsikukkāro (bj); mūsikukkuro (si, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn81:19.12: na vijahati → na vijahi (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn81:21.20: na devotivassi → na cātivassi (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
